column1: Little Goat Diner////My food came out few minutes after ordering; with lots of patrons seated
column2: Â the kitchen staff is on their A game pushing out food fast. The fries were freshly cut
column3: fried and delicious. The goat chili on the other hand wasn't a winner. It didn't work for this application. It was too smoky or overpowering for the fries and it wasn't the meat; I thought something in the chili seasoning was too intense. Goat chili with rice (or even spaghetti
column4: if you're from Cincinnati) may work but on top of french fries wasn't my favorite.
